entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 near midnight then southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or drizzle and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
